response:
"wie kann man noch immer davon sprechen, dass die verarbeitung von personenbezogenen daten 'schutzwürdig' ist? haben wir nicht gelernt, dass unsere persönlichen informationen long gone sind, wenn wir online surfen? es ist zeit, dass wir uns auf die frage konzentrieren, wie wir unsere privatsphäre schützen können, anstatt zu hoffen, dass unternehmen und regierungen unsere daten 'sicher' halten. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "how can we still talk about protecting personal information as if it were a legitimate concern? haven't we learned that our personal data is long gone the moment we go online? it's time for us to focus on how we can protect our privacy, rather than hoping that companies and governments will keep our data 'safe'. #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the idea that personal information can still be protected in the digital age. the author argues that it is time to accept that our personal data is no longer private once we go online, and instead of relying on companies and governments to keep it safe, we should focus on protecting our privacy ourselves. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
